about_the_game:
WHAT IS GRAVITY CAB



In Gravity Cab, players take on the role of a taxi driver to transport passengers underground in a challenging environment of a distant planet. The taxi is controlled by thrusters and effects of physics, such as momentum and gravity, significantly influence the vehicle's movement. The gameplay involves mastering the the taxi's controls, navigating around obstacles and hazards, and solving puzzles to successfully complete each mission.



Gravity Cab offers a modern take on the classic Space Taxi game (originally released in 1984 for the C64). While building upon its adventurous essence, players learn to expertly manoeuvre the cab in various circumstances, leading to the unfolding of a captivating story.


GAME FEATURES

  • Navigate the Gravity Cab, control the thrusters and landing gears.
    Take control of your taxi with precision. Thrusters propel you through a gravity-altered realm where momentum and gravity are your constant companions.

  • Transport passengers in a subterranean world fraught with obstacles and hazards.
    From perilous rock formations to enigmatic puzzles, your journey is rife with tests of your ingenuity and agility.

  • Power-Ups to boost your abilities.

  • Refuel your Gravity Cab at a fuel station to extend your flight time and transport more passengers, thus earning greater rewards.

  • Challenges: Replay game levels with added difficulty.
    With the challenge mode activated, missions become even more demanding, putting your skills and creativity to the ultimate test.

  • Collect points and earn ranks.
    Every successful transport earns you more than just a fare. Collect points, cash and tips, and upgrade your taxi for enhanced performance and versatility.

  • Unfold a story of an erased civilisation.
    Unearth the secrets of this alien planet as you progress. There's more to your passengers and the world around you than meets the eye.
